problem.markdown:
It takes 64 identical cubes to half fill a rectangular box. If each cube has a volume of 8 cubic centimeters, what is the volume of the box in cubic centimeters?

= 1024 [explanation] Double the volume of the cubes needed to half fill the box.
problem.p: It takes 64 identical cubes to half fill a rectangular box. If each cube has a volume of 8 cubic centimeters, what is the volume of the box in cubic centimeters?
Double the volume of the cubes needed to half fill the box.
